sqlMap.sql: REPLY_NUM, BOARD_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, R_CONTENT, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT REPLY_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS REPLY_NUM FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO REPLY (REPLY_NUM, BOARD_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, R_CONTENT, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME) VALUES(#reply_num#, #board_num#, #member_num#, #r_content#, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
sqlMap.select: SELECT FROM REPLY WHERE BOARD_NUM=#board_num# ORDER BY MODIFY_TIME DESC
